content: Please, enter the email address you used for registration. The password recovery instructions will be sent to it.

comment.text: This translation key is used for the instructional text that appears on a forgot password email, guiding users to enter their registered email address. It helps provide clarity and instructions in the UI for password recovery processes.

usage.context:
key="text-body"
 className="text-body"
 isBold={false}
 fontSize="13px"
 >
 {t("MessageSendPasswordRecoveryInstructionsOnEmail")}
 </Text>
 
 <FieldContainer
 className="email-reg-field"
 key="e-mail"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit convoluted. While grammatically correct, it could be more fluent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Xahiş edirik qeydiyyat zamanı istifadə etdiyiniz elektron poçt ünvanını daxil edin. Şifrəni bərpa etmək üçün təlimatlar həmin ünvana göndəriləcəkdir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “Şifrəni sıfırlamaq” (resetting) is not the most accurate translation for 'password recovery instructions'. 'Bərpa etmək' (restore/recover) is a better fit.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Şifrəni bərpa etmək üçün təlimat

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'sent to it' in the English content is not directly translated. While 'на него' (na nego) is grammatically correct, it sounds a bit clunky. A more natural Bulgarian phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Моля, въведете имейла, който използвахте при регистрацията. Инструкциите за възстановяване на паролата ще бъдат изпратени там.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "Please, enter the email address you used for registration" is not accurate. "Bitte E-Mail eingeben, das Sie bei der Registrierung verwendet haben" literally translates to 'Please enter email, that you used during registration'. The use of 'das' is incorrect here. It should be 'welche' or restructured for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bitte geben Sie die E-Mail-Adresse ein, die Sie bei der Registrierung verwendet haben.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Anleitungen zur Änderung eines Passworts werden daran gesendet" is not the most natural way to say 'password recovery instructions will be sent to it'. The wording is a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sie erhalten Anweisungen zum Zurücksetzen Ihres Passworts an diese Adresse.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit long and could be split for better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bitte geben Sie die E-Mail-Adresse ein, die Sie bei der Registrierung verwendet haben. Sie erhalten Anweisungen zum Zurücksetzen Ihres Passworts an diese Adresse.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "The password recovery instructions will be sent to it" is not perfectly translated. "Εκεί θα σας σταλούν οι οδηγίες ανάκτησης του κωδικού πρόσβασης" translates more literally to 'There they will be sent to you'. It's not wrong, but lacks the directness of the English. A more accurate translation for clarity would be something like "Σε αυτό θα σας σταλούν..." or "Θα σας σταλούν σε αυτό..."
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Θα σας σταλούν σε αυτό.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "lors de votre inscription sur le portail" is overly formal and doesn't quite capture the simplicity of "for registration." While technically correct, it sounds clunky in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Merci de renseigner l'adresse e-mail que vous avez utilisée lors de votre inscription.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The French translation uses a slightly more formal tone than the English, which might make it feel distant. Consider a more conversational approach.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Merci de renseigner l'adresse e-mail utilisée lors de votre inscription. Les instructions de récupération de votre mot de passe vous seront envoyées.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'The password recovery instructions will be sent to it' is a bit clunky. A more natural translation would be something like 'ուղարկվեն այդ հասցեին' (will be sent to that address).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Խնդրում ենք մուտքագրել գրանցման համար օգտագործած էլ.փոստը։ Գաղտնաբառի վերականգնման հրահանգները կուղարկվեն այդ հասցեին:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "su di esso" is an awkward and incorrect translation of "to it". It doesn't flow naturally in Italian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Inserisci l'e-mail che hai usato per la registrazione. Le istruzioni per il recupero della password verranno inviate a questo indirizzo.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "パスワード回復の手順がそれに送られます" (password kaifuku no tejun ga sore ni okuraremmasu) is a slightly formal and potentially unnatural way to phrase 'password recovery instructions will be sent to it'. It sounds stiff.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 登録時に使用したメールアドレスを入力してください。パスワード再設定のリンクがそのアドレスに送信されます。(Touroku-ji ni shiyou shita meeru adoresu o nyuuryou shite kudasai. Pasuwa-do saitekisei no rinku ga sono adoresu ni sounshin saremasu.) - This translates to 'Please enter the email address you used for registration. A password reset link will be sent to that address.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a more formal tone than the English original. The English version is slightly more conversational (using 'Please').
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider adjusting the tone to be slightly more conversational, perhaps by using a more casual expression like '이메일 주소를 입력해주세요' instead of '이메일을 입력해주세요'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ໃນການກູ້ຂໍ້ມູນບັນຊີ' (in the context of account recovery) is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would convey the direct purpose of sending password recovery instructions.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ກະລຸນາໃສ່ອີເມວທີ່ທ່ານໃຊ້ສໍາລັບການລົງທະບຽນ. ລະຫັດຜ່ານຈະຖືກສົ່ງໄປຫາທ່ານເພື່ອສືບສາລະ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ອີເມວ' is repeated. While technically correct, it can be slightly redundant in Lao. A more streamlined phrasing is preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ກະລຸນາໃສ່ອີເມວທີ່ທ່ານໃຊ້ສໍາລັບການລົງທະບຽນ. ລະຫັດຜ່ານຈະຖືກສົ່ງໄປຫາທ່ານ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The suggestion removes the repeated word and improves naturalness of the Lao sentence. Full stop mark should be added after the sentence
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ກະລຸນາໃສ່ອີເມວທີ່ທ່ານໃຊ້ສໍາລັບການລົງທະບຽນ. ລະຫັດຜ່ານຈະຖືກສົ່ງໄປຫາທ່ານ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence 'A palavra-passe de recuperação será enviada para esse e-mail.' could be slightly improved for flow. While grammatically correct, it's a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A instrução para recuperação da sua palavra-passe será enviada para esse e-mail.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'a ele' in 'serão enviadas a ele' is grammatically incorrect and awkward. It refers back to 'email' but is not the proper way to express 'to it' in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: serão enviadas para ele

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Introduceți email cu care ai creat contul" is not the most natural way to express "Please, enter the email address you used for registration." It implies possession ('you created the account').
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Introduceți adresa de email folosită pentru înregistrare.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "adresa" is redundant. "Email" is understood as an email address.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Introduceți email folosită pentru înregistrare.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The lack of capitalization at the beginning of the translated sentence. In Romanian, sentences start with a capital letter.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Introduceți email folosită pentru înregistrare.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'на портале' (on the portal) is unnecessary and adds clutter. The email recovery instructions are sent to the email address, not specifically to a portal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Пожалуйста, введите адрес электронной почты, указанный при регистрации. Инструкции для восстановления пароля будут отправлены на этот адрес электронной почты.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'The password recovery instructions will be sent to it' could be improved for clarity and natural flow in Sinhala. A more direct translation would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබගේ වි-තැපැල් ලිපිනයට මුරපදය නැවත ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා උපදෙස් යවනු ලැබේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of a full stop after 'ඔබ ලියාපදිංචිය සඳහා භාවිතා කළ වි-තැපැල් ලිපිනය ඇතුල් කරන්න' might be more appropriate as a comma (,) for better readability in Sinhala.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබ ලියාපදිංචිය සඳහා භාවිතා කළ වි-තැපැල් ලිපිනය ඇතුල් කරන්න,

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "емаил" is a misspelling of "e-mail".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: e-mail

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The verb tense in "ц́е тамо бити послата" is awkward and can be improved for clarity and natural flow.  It translates literally as 'will be sent there,' but in Serbian, it's more natural to simply state the destination.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ће бити послате на њу

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ц́е тамо бити послата" is a literal translation that doesn't quite capture the intended meaning in Serbian. A more natural rendering would indicate that the instructions will be sent *to* the provided email address.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ће бити послате на њу

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "密码恢复指示" (mima huifu zhishi) is overly formal and doesn't quite capture the casual tone of "password recovery instructions". A more natural translation would be something like "密码重置链接" (mima zhongzhi lianjie) or "密码找回说明" (mima zhaohui shuoqing).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 密码重置链接 or 密码找回说明

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the Chinese translation lacks the natural flow and clarity of the English original. Consider rephrasing for improved readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 请输入您注册时使用的邮箱地址。我们将把密码重置链接发送到该邮箱。
